Variables

com. mab. drawing. shapeMaker

Description

Create shapes with ease

Usage

Use the static functions of this class to create shapes.  This class requires the Math2 class.

ToDo

Complete the makeGrid() function

Notes

*notes*

Version

1.0

Author

Michael Bianco, http://mabwebdesign.com/

Date

11/8/05

Summary

Functions

makeBox

static function makeBox(propOb: Object,
path: MovieClip,
name: String):MovieClip

Create a sharp-edged box during runtime

Parameters

propOba object containing the following properties:

color, the color of the box.  Must be hex value.

_x, the x cooridnant the box should be drawn

_y, the y cooridnant the box should be drawn

_width, the width of the box

_height, the height of the box

pathpath to the MC which the box should be attatched to
namename of the box to be drawn

Returns

A reference to the created MC

makeEmptyBox

static public function makeEmptyBox(propOb: Object,
path: MovieClip,
name: String) : MovieClip

makeBitmapBox

static public function makeBitmapBox(propOb: Object,
path: MovieClip,
name: String) : MovieClip

makeCircle

static function makeCircle(propOb,
path,
name)

Creates a circle at runtime

Parameters

propOban object containing the properties of the circle, it must contain:

_x, x position of the circle

_y, y position of the circle

color, hex value of the color of the circle

radius, radius of the circle

_width, width of the circle

_height, height of the circle

pathpath of the movieClip to attach the circle to
namea string representing the name of the MC to create in path

Returns: a reference to the circle created *
